sentence: Dutch champions Ajax Amsterdam faltered in their second league match of the season on Saturday losing 0-0 away at Heerenveen .
tags: B-MISC O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O

sentence: Ajax , who had a dismal series of pre-season results before beating NAC of Breda in their opening game , had the best of an entertaining first half but failed to break the deadlock .
tags: B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: Eight minutes after the interval , Heerenveen 's Romeo Wouden broke through the Amsterdam defence , left defender John Veldman standing and curled the ball beyond goalkeeper Edwin van der Sar into the Ajax net .
tags: O O O O O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER O O O B-LOC O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER O O B-ORG O O

sentence: Ajax , without injured defenders Marcio Santos and Winston Bogarde and strikers Jari Litmanen and Marc Overmars , then stepped up the pace and looked certain to equalise .
tags: B-ORG O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O

sentence: But they left gaps at the back and on 0 minutes Danish striker Jon Dahl Tomasson rushed out of his own half , beat the Ajax defence and lobbed van der Sar .
tags: O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER O

sentence: The defeat means Ajax 's main title contenders PSV Eindhoven , who beat the champions 0-0 in the traditional league curtain-raiser , can go three points clear of their rivals if they beat Groningen on Sunday .
tags: O O O B-ORG O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O
